archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: REFCV
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: 215: all staff who will expect to be considered for the next REF are invited to complete a 'REF CV'. The REF CV is a SharePoint tool that allows researchers to record their research activities and achievements. It will allow all essential REF related information to be stored in one place, be available online and be quickly and easily updated. You can find further information in 'An invitation to staff - Research Excellence Framework' (PDF).
